column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We scoped out what most of the guests were having around us and we concluded that it was mostly the traditional tapas dishes that were being consumed. We skipped the paella with it being just the two of us and wanted to go for dishes that we could get a greater variety. Unfortunately
column2: nearly everything was super greasy and two dishes oddly has a mayo-sriracha based dip.
